Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This extraordinary item is not just a product; it's a testament to innovation and quality. Given its unique features and the effort put into its creation, we believe its value far exceeds $10000. Considering the exceptional craftsmanship and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $15000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this opportunity carefully. If you have any questions or need more information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
